question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to a gray-signed store on the curb of the building to your right. At your current location, if the gray-signed shop is not in view, what is the most relevant object in view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. I already have the gray-signed store within my field of view.  
B. There is no gray-signed shop in sight, but I see a group of motorcycles parked in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
C. There are no shops with gray signs in my field of view, but I see a row of shops on the roadside in the lower right corner.  
D. The store with the gray sign is not in view, but I see the main entrance of a high-rise building across the street on the left side of my view.  
E. The store with the gray sign is out of view, but I see a traffic light in the middle of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The gray-signed shop is not in view, but there is a row of shops on the roadside in the lower right corner of the field of view. This matches the description in option C, which indicates the presence of shops on the roadside, even though the specific gray-signed shop is not visible.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 15), (57, 111), (133, 138)]
Option: C
Reason: From the initial position of the video, the gray-signed shop is not in view. However, a row of shops on the roadside is visible in the lower right corner of the field of view. This aligns with option C. The video segments between 0-15s, 57-111s, and 133-138s show the shops on the roadside.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The gray-signed shop is not in view, but there is a row of shops on the roadside in the lower right corner of the field of view. This matches the description in option C, which indicates the presence of shops on the roadside, even though the specific gray-signed shop is not visible.
